document.full_text: bahraini police clashed with shi'ite marchers in a religious festival late on sunday, less than a week after the gulf kingdom repealed an emergency law that quashed weeks of protests.
document.title: bahrain police clash with shi'ite religious marchers
lines_and_colors: bahraini police clashed with shi'ite marchers in a religious festival late on sunday, less than a week after the gulf kingdom repealed an emergency law that quashed weeks of protests.
